meanings.definition: A heat-resistant fibrous silicate mineral that can be woven into fabrics.
meanings.sent1: The workers wore protective gear to avoid inhaling asbestos fibers.
meanings.sent2: The old building was found to contain asbestos insulation.
meanings.sent3: When the magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, it was actually a trick involving asbestos fibers!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was wrapped in a layer of asbestos, protecting it from the flames of heartbreak.
meanings.sent5: The image of asbestos fibers under a microscope looked like tiny, shimmering threads.

meanings.definition: A material formerly used for fireproofing and insulation.
meanings.sent1: The firefighters were concerned about the asbestos in the old building during the rescue operation.
meanings.sent2: The school had to undergo asbestos removal to ensure the safety of the students.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was made of asbestos, making him fireproof and invincible!
meanings.sent4: His words were like asbestos, protecting her from the harsh realities of life.
meanings.sent5: The walls of the ancient castle were lined with asbestos, guarding it against the ravages of time.
